about_the_game:
In GOPOGO, you are a small frog in a big pond, and there are great challenges ahead of you. You must become one with the pogostick, you will need to aim and time your jumps with great skill if you want to make it to the finish.

Race against the clock and perfect your times in each level OR hop into a chaotic multiplayer race against your friends.

Features

  • Unique and satisfying gameplay, aim and time each hop and jump.

  • Many levels ranging in easy to insanely difficult, something for everyones

  • Multiplayer Coop & PvP - Complete levels with your friends or race against them and sabotage each other.

  • Immersive Hub World - Chill at the pond and change levels without having to leave your pogostick or use a menu.

name: GOPOGO

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD G1
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1050 Ti
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
